name: Stay All Day Waterproof Liquid Eye Liner
ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Ammonium Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Alcohol, Beheneth-30, Acrylates/Octylacrylamide Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Polyglyceryl-3 Disiloxane Dimethicone, Propylparaben, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate. (+/-) Black 2 (CI 77266)(Nano).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Shake well before use..-Before lining, pull gently on the upper corner of the eye area to stretch and smooth the area. This will make it easier to line and eliminate bleeding..-Apply the liner as close to the lashes as possible. In order to avoid a gap between the lashes and the lining, try painting the liner into the lashes using small, feathering strokes..-Store horizontally for best performance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am an eyeliner girl. I've been rocking cat eye eyeliner before it became a huge makeup trend, so I strictly use felt tip liquid liner. I have never had an issue with my eyeliner running or smudging, until I hit my 30s. Once I hit the dirty 30 club, my skin completely changed, including the skin on my eyelids. I now, apparently, have very oily eyelids, which I didn't even realize was a thing until it became my nuisance. My eyeliner now wants to stamp itself on my upper lid when my eyes are open, the inner and outer corners run and smear like no other, and my norm had become looking like a raccoon within a few hours of applying makeup. I have been on the search for my Holy Grail eyeliner, one that actually stays put, can combat oil and sweat, and doesn't give me insane dark circles. Well lucky for me, I received the Stila Stay All Day Waterproof liner recently, and I can't lie. I expected it to fail me after a few hours, because literally everything else had up to that point. When I tell you that this eyeliner does not move, it does not move. Even with my oily eyelids, at the end of the day the color of my wings seems less intense compared to initial application, but even so, it has not moved. This is huge for me! I actually tested this on the back of my hand, and it stayed put through 2 whole days of frequent hand washing. I even rubbed coconut oil across this eyeliner when on my hand, and it barely moved. As an added bonus, this felt tip is super sharp and can give you crisp, thin lines, or thicker, bolder lines. Ladies, this is the one. I don't think I'll ever go back to another liner unless I can find something to top it, and after all the products I've tried, that's going to take some work! Just get the eyeliner. You won't regret it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeliner has a very precise tip that makes it easy to draw a clean line. I am normally not a liquid liner girl, but I feel like I got good practice with this one! It definitely lasts all day and does not smudge. Although itu2019s waterproof it does come off easily with a makeup wipe and double washing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Stila Stay All Day Liquid Waterproof Eyeliner is a standout product in my makeup collection. Applying it is a breeze; the felt-tip applicator allows for precise lines, making it easy to achieve both thin, subtle looks and bold, dramatic wings. The finish is impressive u2013 a rich, intense black that adds a striking definition to my eyes.  One of the most commendable aspects of this eyeliner is its exceptional longevity. True to its name, it indeed stays all day without smudging or running. I've worn it through long days and even sweaty workouts, and it remains intact, maintaining its intense color without any smudging or flaking. Its waterproof formula is reliable, ensuring that it stays put regardless of weather conditions.  Despite its fantastic performance, I must note that some individuals with sensitive eyes might experience slight irritation. Additionally, the price is higher compared to other eyeliners, but the quality and durability justify the cost.  Having experienced its reliability and impressive performance firsthand, I would absolutely purchase and highly recommend the Stila Stay All Day Liquid Waterproof Eyeliner. Its ease of application, long-lasting formula, and smudge-proof nature make it a worthwhile investment for anyone seeking a dependable eyeliner that delivers both style and durability.

reviews.review_title: A permanent part of my makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this liner for 7 years now, and since my first time using it, every other liner has failed to compete. The pigment is unparalleled, each stroke applies evenly, and it doesn't fade or smudge throughout the day or evening.   The quality is well worth the price, and it doesn't run out as quickly as other liners I've used. I use this liner pretty much every day, and it usually lasts at least 2 months. It can seem like it's running low before then, but 9/10 times giving it a good shake is all it needs. I get compliments on my liner all the time, and every time I've recommended this liner to someone it always amazes them!  It has a few small flaws. It can get a little smudgy around my tear ducts, but only right after application. When it's starting to run out, the tip can get a bit frayed so it's not as easy to get a sharp line, but that's pretty standard for a liquid liner with a felt tip. The only improvement I could think of would be a grip to make it easier to hold while applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A staple Iu2019ve been using forever. Easy to apply, doesnu2019t budge all day, and it lasts a really long time for me.

I just pulled the cap off like normal and it would bubble from the seam and drip everywhere. Trying to find a substitute with less packaging issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be my holy grail liner. I recently purchased it again for the first time in a couple of years and wow, what a disappointment. Poor pigmentation, impossible to layer, and dries out far too quickly. This liner used to be amazing and lasted for months at a time. I have had it for five weeks now, have used it maybe twice a week, and it is already completely dried out and useless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Good applicator and easy to apply. Very pigmented and nice matte finish. My only complaint is that it will sometimes crack after a few hours of wear.

reviews.review_title: Great but might dry out prematurely?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first application was amazing, and the product stays on really well.  However after the second or third application it has already started skipping a little bit when trying to apply a straight line.  This is a new one that I purchased recently.  My previous one lasted a really long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great waterproof liner. Stays on for a long time without smearing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the applicator, super opaque black matte finish which I love! Eyeliner wings tend to degrade a bit after a few hours, but still a solid product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very precise liner love it. I donu2019t mind that itu2019s not smudge proof or waterproof as long as itu2019s black and easy to apply and easy to make precise small fine lines itu2019s perfect for me and it does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this eyeliner for the past 8 years consistently and I can strongly say that nothing compares to its durability, sleek look, and quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice liquid eyeliner, but it wasn't smudge/waterproof for me at all. It goes on nicely, and the ink was consistent enough, but throughout the day my wings kept smudging and slowly deteriorated. I do have rather oily eyelids and didn't use any primer, but was hoping the fact that it was advertised as Waterproof wouldn't require extra product to keep it in place. Not sure I'd pay this much for waterproof eyeliner again. I can get one from the drugstore for 1/3 the price that actually stays on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The point is super sharp making for a great wing! However this product is NOT waterproof in the slightest! If anything my other eyeliner not advertised as waterproof are more waterproof! If you donu2019t care about that this is a pretty good eyeliner. Itu2019s very patchy and doesnu2019t have a lot of pigment though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For years I was using the Kat Von D tattoo liner just because I really didnu2019t think Iu2019d find anything better out there. A lot of felt too liners always bled (I have hooded eyes), a lot of liquid ones would chip off, and some brush tip ones just didnu2019t have great pigmentation and Iu2019d have to keep going over the line just to get an opaque color. I finally gave into the hype this has had for years and I was not disappointed. The brush is a felt tip but itu2019s FLEXIBLE. So it gives me amazing control to go thin or thick. On the first swipe itu2019s an opaque black so I donu2019t need to go over the line multiple times AND itu2019s water proof. I have oily skin, Iu2019ve cried, Iu2019ve sweat through this, I even went to Niagara Falls and the only reason it came off is because I rubbed it off. If you store it upside-down like I do, it lasts me for months and I use it daily. This is the best black liquid liner on the market and itu2019s a cult favorite for a reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this eyeliner for six years, so I should probably write a review. This is the only eyeliner that Iu2019ve consistently purchased. I have monolids, so itu2019s difficult to find liner that doesnu2019t smear/smudge/run when I wear it all day. On top of that, I usually do winged liner so I need an applicator that is easy to handle. Every other liner whether waterproof or not, whether liquid, gel, pencil, or crayon will end up messy by the end of the day. Stilau2019s eyeliner doesnu2019t do that. It will stay all day if youu2019re skiing, walking to and from work on a rainy fall day, or experiencing humidity in the south. I even applied it before a 12 hour trans-pacific flight, and my wings looked just as good when I landed. The pens also last a long time. I apply it almost every day and donu2019t run out quickly. The point on the tip is perfect for drawing wings as well.

reviews.review_title: Do Not Buy In Color Intense Smoky Quartz!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do NOT buy this in color Intense Smoky Quartz. I've now purchased this THREE times in an attempt to acquire one that works, and all three times the product has been too dried out to use. I'm not sure if this is due to product quality or if Sephora has aged products on hand. I regularly purchase this liner in color Intense Black, and I have never had problems with it. I've wasted almost $70; I'm very unhappy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Out of the many liquid liners I have tried, this eyeliner applies the smoothest and most precise, has rich color, and doesnu2019t flake away as the day goes on.

reviews.review_title: The only eyeliner that stays on all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the eyeliner I can never part ways with. This eyeliner stays all day without stinging my eyes. When it's time to remove it, I don't need to rub rigorously for it to come off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The formula itself is awesome and does not budge...the felt tip is just annoying and frays easily. I would be all over this if the tip was a brush-tip instead. Still a nice product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best eyeliner I have ever used, it is intense in color, glides on smooth, and lasts all day. Easy to apply and correct if any mistakes are made during application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cult classic. Iu2019ve been getting these for almost ten years ago, it really stays in place and gives that deep black shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: used once and the felt tip got completely dry. im not sure about the other colors but this one is definitely streaky and a complete mess to work with

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: the tip is strong and is very easy to apply. HOWEVER, this is so not waterproof. my eyes are watery and the amount of times I've had to reapply my eyeliner is WAYYYY too many. if you're like me, stay away from this liner. it is NOT waterproof whatsoever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Waste of money. it used to be a good product. Now, it runs all over my face within a hour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect eyeliner for a deeply saturated, dramatic look that stays all day. Any time I want wings or cat eyes (so like every day let's be honest lol), this is the one I reach for. I switched to this eyeliner a couple years ago from the KVD Inked Liner--I loved the applicator on that but it was bad about flaking later in the day. Before that, I was using Lancome Artliner which I loved for the saturated color but would run as the day progressed. The Stila eyeliner has everything I loved about the others--the saturation, the great applicator, and easy, smooth lines but with actual staying power. If you're on the fence about trying this eyeliner, DO IT!   FYI, I do typically pair this up with the Urban Decay eye primer to help lock it in place.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do not listen to the bad reviews frrr this is the best eyeliner u could but I PROMISE YOUUUU thank u for existing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down, the best liquid eye liner! Precise but flexible enough to make the line you want without too much pressure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a replacement for Pat McGrath and this exceeded expectations.  What a marvelous eyeliner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this was recommended to me at my local store since they'd run out of the rare beauty liner... honestly I'm liking this one better so far! the lines go on clean and stay on all day. I haven't had issues with the liquid bubbling up like the rare beauty one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For reference, I have slight hooded eyelids that does get oily, and eyes that water very easily especially under hot dry weather. This eyeliner is probably one of the few best eyeliners I've ever used. I put on this eyeliner on hot days, and even though my eyes did get watery, the eyeliner stayed put well. The precision is great as well, with the pen thick enough to hold and control.  I did use some oil control powder as well as swab around my eyelids to remove the extra oil that could smudge the eyeliner (for all those who have oily eyelids, this tricks helps ALOT), but nonetheless no smudging like other eyeliners I've used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Having been a long time user of the black shade of this Stila eyeliner pen, I wanted to branch out and try the Midnight shade to make my brown eyes pop. Pros: eyeliner goes on smooth as expected, color is a nice deep navy blue, and gives a clean line. Cons: it is NOT waterproof! So disappointing to see it smudge so easily after working to get the perfect cat eye. I donu2019t recall the black shade being so easy to smudge. I am so sad this didnu2019t work out, and Iu2019ll keep looking for a true waterproof navy blue eyeliner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use only pencil liner in high school, one day I decided to give liquid liner a try. I had tried multiple liquid liners and out of all of them, this is the one I always go back to. I have been using this for 6-7+ years (can't even remember because it's been so long) and it is honestly the best. The pen isn't stiff, it's easy to get a good precise line. I also love that the formula doesn't dry out super quick! I don't wear makeup everyday but this liner lasts me for at least 6+ months, I typically purchase maybe 2 per year. The only concern is that I have a monolid and if I blink, sometimes it could transfer to other areas as it doesn't dry down super fast, but I think that's just a personal issue I have with it due to my eye shape. It lasts all night and doesn't transfer, it's also a true black in color! It is not patchy at all. I also love that this doesn't irritate my eyes! Honestly, hands down my ride or die liner, I don't think I'l ever find anything better!

reviews.review_title: Don't but if you're planning on leaving your house
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like the fact that it glides on very well and precise but it runs a lot.  I wore it for 2 hours and the wing on my eye was totally gone.  It looked pretty bad cause the other side was about halfway gone so I had to scrub off the other side off so it wouldn't look as bad until I got home.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is smooth. The tip is very sharp which makes application easy. The color is nice. I buy this product over and over again. Completely in love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOATHE this eyeliner. Normally I use KVD liquid liners and love them. I tried this one for a color change. The tip dries out so fast itu2019s impossible to get a clean line. Iu2019ve tried holding to tip at different angles, storing in different positions and every time the line on my first eye is relatively clean and the second eye is trash. It flakes, itu2019s impossible to get a clean line. Every time Iu2019ve used it I have to go over it again and cover it with my usual liquid liner to make it look decent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this eyeliner the first week of getting it, but the tip dried up so quickly and I couldnu2019t do anything more about it.  So the lines werenu2019t as crisp and clean afterwards.  I loved that it stayed on all day, but with the dry part now, it takes me forever just to have a full liner, and cracks easily, doesnu2019t apply as nicely or stay on as nicely as it did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time I tried this eyeliner was from a free sample/birthday gift either way it has been one of my favorite waterproof eyeliners Iu2019ve ever used and still my go to especially since I have watery eyes, long lasting for sure but easy to take off when needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my staple eyeliner. Creates great precision lines and stays on all day. I wouldn't say it's completely waterproof because if you try to rub it hard with some water it will come off but if water just splashes on your face, you'll be fine. It is long lasting even on oily lids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This liner has great pigment and excellent applicator tip that is smooth with no skipping. However, it is not waterproof. After wearing for approximately 4 hours it is flaking off my lids and the wings of my liner are smudged and look as if theyu2019ve been wiped off. Will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really banking on this product to replace a pricier one I usually use but this was just such a disappointment. The pen dries out so fast regardless of how you store it and the application is inconsistent as well because of this. Donu2019t even try to try on this as waterproof because it just comes off so easily well before the end of the day. I wish the colour was more potent as well but again the dark brown was inconsistent in colour as well as application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this, it works well, I like the tip and formula, didnt stay as long as I would have hoped but it's the best I've found

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only used it 3 times and now itu2019s completely dried out. I tried storing it upside down, putting it in hot water, shaking it, nothing works. super bummed out cuz Iu2019ve read really good things about this liner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best eyeliner owned, easy to apply on the lids. This product doesnu2019t crease.

reviews.review_title: The only eye liner I use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Stop looking, ladies.   This liner is wonderful. You never have to sharpen it, it's waterproof, and it's super easy to apply. You can do light little dots for lighter coverage, or draw on gorgeous smokey eyes for a dramatic look. Love love love this.   It lasts forever, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Initially I liked this eyeliner and I think it could be quite nice for people who don't wear eyeshadow, but I do, and this dried out so quickly afterwards. If I give it a good shake and wipe the tip after using it on my eyelid once eyeshadow has gotten on it, it only works for about one stroke without having to do that all over again, so it wasn't worth the trouble and ended up tossing it. Again, I think this could be nice for you if you don't wear eyeshadow / concealer / powder on your lids but definitely skip this if you do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to eyeliner. It never fails and always looks great. Great formula, it lasts all day and night. The applicator is great for a cat eye or graphic eye liner.

reviews.review_title: Poor pigment, oxidizes, smudges, not all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably one of the worst eyeliners I have ever used and I would not recommend it. I don't have a single positive thing to say about it: the pigment sucks, it doesn't have all day hold, the claim to being waterproof is laughable, and it oxidizes and smudges incredibly easy. I have eyeliners from other brands that are over a year old that are better than a new one of these. Overall, really disappointed with this product and will not purchase again.

reviews.review_title: Iu2019m Armenian trust me itu2019s good :)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best liquid liner right now on the market in my opinion because itu2019s very dark and color goes on consistently and applicator is just right- next best ones are the benefit (not dark enough), kat von d (weird applicator) and fenty (too shiny but easy to use and dark)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: eyeshadow primer must be applied first. My eyeliner stayed perfectly at least 15 hrs

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For me, it stays about 2-3 hours. This is getting returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely not waterproof. Too bad too because itu2019s great to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is crummy. It doesn't go on smoothly, leaves crusty bits, and peels off if you touch it. Soooooo bad. Sephora sent me a fabulous alternative, the Smashbox one (which is great!).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great stuff! Lasts all day- even through sweat. Just be prepared to buy this often. The pen dries out quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice color but the tip of the pen dries up very fast

reviews.review_title: one of my favourite black eyeliners
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye liner is very easy to use and it always stays on throughout the day. I always get compliments when I wear this eyeliner from strangers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smudges all over my eyes every time in just an hour

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: They arenu2019t kidding!! It really it waterproof!! Stays all day long!! (Even all night)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST eyeliner. My holy grail. The applicator has a little flexibility unlike other brands, which I find helpful. It also truly does stay all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my go to liner for awhile. There are definitely pros and cons. Here are the pros: Firstly, it is easy to apply. If you are a beginner with eyeliner, this is a great one to start with. The felt tip is very easy to control and it's easy to practice making a perfect line. Secondly, the color is rich and it applies beautifully and evenly. It does not dry out like other liner's I have used. Thirdly, it has a long shelf life and it lasts a long time on your face. It is waterproof.   Here are the cons: It smudges if you aren't careful. It's not hypoallergenic. The felt tip eventually dries out. It is a higher price than a lot of liners.   I think in my opinion this is one of the best liners at sephora and on the market. However don't get it if you have watery eyes or allergies.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This didn't work well for my oily lids. The eyeliner smudged a lot for me. It has an intense black color but it doesn't work for me.

looks cute BUT if you have watery eyes (allergies, windy weather, or if you cry easily) dont get it because it WILL smudge :( my left eye waters easily due to seasonal allergies so it ends up looking great on my right eye but horrible on my left if you dont have watery eyes then this is prob gonna be perfect for you - looks great and is easy to apply

reviews.review_title: Five Starsu2026 But Only in Black
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail black liquid eyeliner.   My eyelids are infamously oily, and every other eyeliner I have tried has transferred onto my upper lids.   It has just the right thickness and firmness in the tip. I store this upside down in my brush cup because it seems to stay wet that way.   BIG disclaimer: this product is amazing, but ONLY if you get it in the intense black shade. Every other shade Iu2019ve tried is AWFUL. Iu2019m talking, will-be-dry-and-dragging-within-a-couple-uses awful. I absolutely do NOT recommend this if you are not getting intense black. That being said, if you need a good BLACK eyeliner for oily lids, get this. (Note: I do use this over Narsu2019 eyeshadow primer).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Little to no pigment, and it didnu2019t apply well at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've heard such good things about this eyeliner, I was so excited to try it. Maybe I got a dud? The application is really patchy and inconsistent, and doesn't build or layer at all. I can get a little more of a consistent application at the base of the applicator point, but almost nothing at the tip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Point is very thin and I found it to be difficult to use compared to the Kat Von D liner! I was disappointed because Iu2019m pretty good with applying liner and this was very difficult to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best felt tip eyeliner. I've tried multiple brands over the years and always come back to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeliner. It glides on yet still gives me a nice, sharp wing. It lasts all day, have great pigment, and there is lots of product in this little tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok ok ok I know everyone says this but this is literally the best eyeliner out there. I love large exaggerated eyeliner looks, graphic liners, etc. but for a PURE BLACK, this is my go too. I use this in cat eye, simple overlays, etc. it's super water resistant, lasts long shifts where I'm on my feet and get hot, I've had full breakdowns in this eyeliner and it'll barely smudge! I always recommend this to my friends when they ask for a good liner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased my last tube of this stuff a few months before the pandemic, then didnu2019t use it at all and let it age and roll around in my makeup bag for about 16 months. I just used it again after all the time, and went on a long walk in the Texas July heat and the eyeliner didnu2019t smudge or flake. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like I have tried every waterproof eyeliner under the sun because I have incredibly watery outer corners on my eyes. This does stay longer than most. But I still see a bleed, even with setting spray. I think if you don't have super watery eyes this will work well for you. But like me if that is what you struggle with, this is only just ok.

reviews.review_title: Runs off when my eyes water
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My eyes water and this liner runs from the outside of my eye to below my eye before I even get to work in the morning.  Definitely NOT waterproof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It didnu2019t smear or anything but it is way too thick for me to do a smooth and thin finish touch for the eye lining. Wouldnu2019t recommend if you want an eye liner thatu2019s thin and lowkey and not too conspicuous

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I mustu2019ve got unlucky with this one. I asked a Sephora worker for the darkest eyeliner preferably that wouldnu2019t smear and I was guaranteed that this was the one. My first use it was the complete opposite it constantly smeared and faded. It was pretty disappointing

reviews.review_title: Great staying power and easy to apply
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great staying power and the felt tip makes it so easy to apply eyeliner. Only thing is that the felt tip can absorb any eyeshadow on your lid and make it less opaque, which is a little annoying. This is my current favorite eyeliner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t understand the rave reviews about this product. It feels sticky and never dries down. My eyelids feel like theyu2019re sticking together the whole time I have this on. Then itu2019s smeared all over my eyelids with an hour of applying. u201cStay All Dayu201d is a joke. Youu2019re lucky if stays 10 minutes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i swear to you this eyeliner has made it through many many MANY crying nights and although i hate myself for it iu2019ve slept with this on and i woke up with minimal smudging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried every eyeliner possible and always come back to Stila. Longwear, smooth application and last a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I gave birth to our son and after 12+ hours of labor and an emergency C-Section u2014 my eyeliner was still fire. When my Dr walked into the delivery room to tell us that C-Section was the best option [and after we agreed and were waiting on the operating room], her next comment was u201cLetu2019s talk about that eyeliner - you look fantastic!!u201d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have eyelid that gets oily and eyes watery. All types and brands of eyeliner Iu2019ve tried wouldnu2019t stay even a day of work, and we have A/C. The black would fade, smudge and u00ab print u00bb over my lids as I have slight hooded eyes.  For my first try with this one today, itu2019s stayed perfectly. Also putting it on goes so well as the pen releases the liquid well.  Definite u00ab I would recommend u00bb!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

I'm glad I tried it! Applies easily, dries quickly. Make sure to apply in good lighting to ensure its as dark as you'd like it, as you will probably have to go over it to get it opaque. I have hooded eyes and oily skin (and I can't be bothered to be touching up makeup all day lol) so staying power is a must. It stays on all day with zero transfer. And comes off easily with makeup remover when you want it to! (Also for the record, I do a dramatic, edging on Amy Winehouse cat eye and Stila has been great.) Hopefully this helps anyone considering purchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's gotten better the last time I tried it many many years ago, but I still hate it. It completely smudged all over my eyelids and faded within a few hours. GOOD eyeliner isn't supposed to come off when you're filling it in. I've tried so many felt eyeliners and they're all crap except maybe the Mac one. The Mac one still comes off but at least it tries to hold on for a little longer and is a smoother product.  The beauty world hates people with watery hooded eyes it seems.  Disappointed.. again...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: handsdown one of the BEST eyeliner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really disappointed with this product. After years of just using drugstore felt tip eyeliners I decided to invest in a nice one and settled on this one. Looks great immediately after applying, but will transfer onto your eyelid and smudge all over the place within an hour. Iu2019ve done my best to apply carefully and allow it to dry well with my eyes closed, tried different styles of wing to see if certain shapes would hold up better, neutralized oil on my lids with powder, etc, etc, and nothing makes this problem go away. And I donu2019t even have super oily skin! Absolutely not worth the money. I was better off using my eight dollar liquid eyeliner from Walgreens.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I would give zero stars if I could. Iu2019ve been an almost-daily liquid eyeliner user for about 15 years and this is the WORST purchase Iu2019ve ever made in that regard. No such thing as a perfect cat eye with this product... the liquid bleeds out leaving lines uneven and splotchy. And Iu2019m EXCELLENT when it comes to liquid eyeliner application. Not only that but an hour after application, it was smudging into the crease above my eyelid. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to eyeliner. It stays put and is easy to get that sharp point I love!

I used to swear by this liner, but now that I work longer days, I noticed that it doesnu2019t last as long. Definitely better for short term wear.

reviews.review_title: Get the micro liner by stila instead
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin

I can work long days and not worry about smudging, yet when it is time to remove my makeup at the end of the day it does so easily. Hoping this product stays around for the remaining years of my life to be a lifelong partner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite eyeliner ever. It is really easy to use. I am usually not good at eyeliner but this liner could not make it easier!!! I would recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best eyeliner I have used, and I have tried every liquid eye liner brand and none of them compare. This will last all day and night, no transference, it looks like you just put it on 12 hours later.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It works really well! Although it may take a few seconds too dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

Comes out in patches even after shacking properly, itu2019s not drying sufficiently although says u2018waterproofu2019 and it looks like cheap bad quality liner in couple of hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my best purchase which made my life a lot easier. It has a very black colour which is the best part and it does stay for more than 8 hours. I bought this 2 time and itu2019s literally the best.

Probably the best eyeliner Iu2019ve ever purchased. Although Iu2019m used to purchasing drug store. Lasts so long doesnu2019t dry out. The only bad thing is the tip can get kind of feathery after a lot of uses but besides that itu2019s great. Also stays on all day. Very good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not nearly as good as KVD tattoo or Lancu00f4me. Too much comes out of the tip so itu2019s hard to apply it evenly and it goes on super wet and smears super easily. There is also a ton of excess gunk in the cap. I have to fix it with a Q-tip every single time I apply it and dread putting it on everyday. Iu2019ve worn eyeliner everyday for 10 years and have tried so many brands and this was the biggest disappointment.  Canu2019t wait to use it up so I can replace it with KVD again... maybe Iu2019ll use it to write my grocery list with to use it up... 2 stars because despite how bad it is, this little tube has lasted quite a long time without drying up or running out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Probably my new favorite eyeliner, with just a few small complaints. I had been using Benefit's Roller Eyeliner for a while before, so I'm a bit spoiled by the fast drying and soft nib.  Stila's SAT liner takes a bit longer to dry down and has a sharper, less flexible nib, but is overall much more saturated in color and pretty comfortable to wear.  And this stuff does NOT budge!  It comes off easily with cleansing oil, but other than that it sticks where you put it!  The nib doesn't bend and leaves a great sharp line for winged liner, and the formula isn't sticky or strange feeling on the lids.  Will definitely purchase again and suggest, just wish it was a bit softer/more flexible, but that's a personal thing for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this will ALWAYS be the best eyeliner on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not for me, smudge all over my eyelid after just a few minutes of application.

reviews.review_title: Worst liquid liner I've ever used.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I went in expecting a lot because I heard so much about this liner being great, and my NYX one had just died, so I was super hype to get this....I chose the labradorite because black is a bit harsh on my skin, and god do I regret it.  Not only is this not waterproof, it's gummy when dry, and patchy as all heck. You have to press the tip down very hard to get any actual pigmentation, and unless you do your eyeliner in one perfect swoop, it will dry too fast and the tip will literally take the previously applied liner off. You can also just touch it briefly 10 mins after applying and it pills off in patches.   I don't know if sephora messed up and sent me an expired one (as I also received broken products in the same order) or if the liner is just trash in this color, but it's a complete waste of money. Wish I could return it,  but timing wise I messed up. I'm just going to buy another NYX one and never buy a stila liner again lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

Good saturation, so it gets 2 stars. look elsewhere if you want true waterproof and budge free.  in my pic I rubbed my eyes lightly just you can see how terrible it smears

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

My other liners would only last maybe 6 months.. almost as if they dried up, not that I used up all the product..  any way if youu2019re thinking about buying this, do it. Itu2019s worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t love this product. I didnu2019t feel like the staying power was very good. The felt tip is also much longer than most liquid eye liners, which makes it more difficult to control. Not for me.

reviews.review_title: Some second chances donu2019t work out
